main_definition: In computing, 'diffs' refers to the differences between two sets of data or files. In idiomatic usage, it can also mean disagreements or conflicts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Differences in changes made to versioned files
meanings_and_examples.example: After comparing the diffs between versions 1 and 2 of a document, we noticed several significant updates.
There have been some heated 'diffs' among team members regarding the project timeline.
